original_title: ボクの布団に朝帰りしたヤンキー義妹がもぐりこんできて…
overview: The sister-in-law whose father remarried and lived with him was a Yankee woman. She is a cheeky, selfish and stubborn sister-in-law, and is honestly confused about living with such an alien 120%. When she came home drunk, she made a mistake in her room and rolled into my futon, and Ji-Po reacted unintentionally to a cute sleeping face that I would never normally show.
title: My Bad Girl Little Stepsister Came Home In The Morning After A Night Out And Crawled Into My Futon…
